entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 70 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres rising to 1400 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
